title: [java] slf4j+log4j、slf4j+logback、slf4j+log4j2总结
content: 日志门面图解 slf4j+log4j+logback总结 ``` 总结 1、slf4j提供各种抽象接口，日志应该基于slf4j的API进行日志打印，这样无论迁移到那个项目，只需要配一个实现类log4j or logback,都能正常打印日志 2、slf4j的实现类不能有多个，不然冲突 3、如果项目中有直接引用log4j的，可以加入log4j-over-slf4j，把旧的日志log4j适配到slf4j,这时候，再使用logback就可以了。 ``` 哪些采用了log4j ``` kafka org.slf4j log4j-over-slf4j 1.7.7 ``` spring-boot-starter默认使用logback ``` ch.qos.logback logback-core 1.1.2 ch.qos.logback logback-access 1.1.2 ch.qos.logback logback-classic 1.1.2 ``` 常见组合： （1）log4j+slf4j ``` slf4j-api-1.7.25.jar log4j-1.2.17.jar slf4j-log4j12-1.7.25.jar org.slf4j slf4j-api 1.7.25 log4j log4j 1.2.17 org.slf4j slf4j-log4j12 1.7.25 Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Object.class); logger.error("==== log4j ===="); ``` （2）slf4j-log4j12（注意：需要编写 log4j.properties 文件，且logback-classic 、log4j-over-slf4j 都与 slf4j-log4j12冲突） ``` #log4j.properties log4j.rootLogger=INFO, stdout log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender log4j.appender.stdout.Target=System.out log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{ABSOLUTE} %5p %c{1}:%L - %m%n #pom.xml org.slf4j slf4j-log4j12 1.7.25 ``` （3）slf4j+logback ``` slf4j-api-1.7.25.jar logback-core-1.2.3.jar logback-classic-1.2.3.jar org.slf4j slf4j-api 1.7.25 ch.qos.logback logback-core 1.2.3 ch.qos.logback logback-classic 1.2.3 Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Object.class); logger.error("==== logback ===="); ``` logback的使用 > 日志类的区别 ``` #logback private final static org.slf4j.Logger logger = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(Object.class); #log4j private static final org.apache.log4j.Logger logger = org.apache.log4j.Logger.getLogger(Object.class); #log4j2 private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger = org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager.getLogger(Object.class); ``` slf4j与log4j、log4j2 ``` org.slf4j slf4j-api 1.7.25 org.apache.logging.log4j log4j-api 2.7 org.apache.logging.log4j log4j-core 2.7 org.apache.logging.log4j log4j-slf4j-impl 2.7 ``` slf4j+log4j2 ``` 如果我们在系统中需要使用slf4j和log4j2来进行日志输出的话，我们需要引入下面的jar包： log4j2核心jar包：log4j-api-2.7.jar和log4j-core-2.7.jar slf4j核心jar包：slf4j-api-1.6.4.jar slf4j与log4j2的桥接包：log4j-slf4j-impl-2.7.jar，这个包的作用就是使用slf4j的api，但是底层实现是基于log4j2 所以我们获取日志仍可以通过下面的代码进行： ``` ``` import org.slf4j.Logger; import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory; public class Slf4jTest { private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(Slf4jTest2.class); public static void main(String[] args) { logger.info("hello world"); } } ``` slf4j+log4j不修改代码升级到log4j2 ``` 如果我们系统中刚开始用的是slf4j和log4j，然后出于性能考虑，要升级到slf4j和log4j2，并且不需要改动任何代码的话(因为我们系统可能是一个大工程，然后基本上每个类都会有日志输出，改动代码可能牵一发而动全身)，出于这个考虑，我们可以这样来进行修改： 1、删除项目中存在的Log4j1.x所必须的log4j和slf4j-log4j12等依赖，例如从我们上面做的去升级的话，需要删除log4j-1.2.17.jar和slf4j-log4j12-1.6.1.jar 2、添加log4j2和slf4j桥接包：log4j-slf4j-impl-2.7.jar替换log4j和slf4j桥接包：slf4j-log4j12-1.6.1.jar 3、如果我们在系统中使用了log4j的api去获取Logger的话： org.apache.log4j.Logger logger = org.apache.log4j.Logger.getLogger(Log4jTest.class) 我们需要添加log4j-1.2-api-2.7.jar去替换log4j-1.2.17.jar 4、将log4j的properties文件修改为log4j2的xml文件 然后，同样在系统中使用slf4j的方式获取日志： org.slf4j.Logger logger = org.slf4j.LoggerFactory.getLogger(Self4jTest.class); ``` springboot默认集成logback说明 springboot+logback springboot+log4j|Failed to load class "org.slf4j.impl.StaticLoggerBinder"的问题 ``` org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-logging org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-log4j org.slf4j slf4j-log4j12 1.7.25 ``` springboot+log4j2 Spring Boot自定义log4j2日志文件 springboot 中 log4j2的使用及配置讲解 ``` org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-web org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-logging org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-log4j2 1.5.8.RELEASE ```

title: [docker] docker+php
content: ``` docker run ubuntu:14.04 /bin/echo 'Hello World' docker run -it ubuntu:14.04 /bin/bash sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install apache2 /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo chmod 777 /var/www #对注册为服务的程序可以全局使用 service sudo service apache2 restart #未注册 service 需要制定到程序目录 sudo /etc/init.d/apache2 restart #Nginx 和 Apache 会抢夺80端口，最好先停止其中一个再装。 sudo apt-get install nginx #安装PHP5以及常用模块 sudo apt-get install libapache2-mod-php5 php5 php5-gd php5-mysql php5-fpm php5-mcrypt php5-curl libcurl3 libcurl3-dev #apache的php.ini /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini; #nginx的php.ini /etc/php5/fpm/php.ini #另外装PHP的时候，也自动装了解析器，用来解析PHP语法，两个主要的文件分别在这两个目录： /var/run/php5-fpm.sock /var/run/php5-fpm.pid #在程序工作中，可能会因为权限问题PHP无法创建目录，这是因为在这里有个用户组配置 /etc/php5/fpm/pool.d/www.conf #里面有两个默认设置是 user = www-data group = www-data #需要给目录设置用户组以及用户为 www-data:www-data 并重启FPM user = www-data:www-data group = www-data:www-data sudo apt-get install mysql-server mysql-client 安装过程中需要设置 root 密码，我设置的是 root。这步要记住自己设置的密码！ sudo apt-get install phpmyadmin ln -s /usr/share/phpmyadmin /var/www/html phpMyAdmin 需要配置扩展目录 extension_dir，需要修改 php.ini。 #假如配置 Apache 位置在这里： sudo vi /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini #假如配置 Nginx 位置在这里： sudo vi /etc/php5/fpm/php.ini 需要做这几个改动 extension_dir 启用，并且值等于“PHP扩展目录” extension=msql.so 的注释解除 extension=curl.so 解决 curl 问题 （Nginx） 记录几个重要的目录位置 php.ini 目录： /etc/php5/apache2/php.ini PHP扩展目录（日期可能不同）： /usr/lib/php5/20131226 nginx.conf 配置文件： /etc/nginx/nginx.conf Nginx 的 php.ini /etc/php5/fpm/php.ini Apache2 配置文件： /etc/apache2/apache2.conf phpmyadmin 所在目录： /usr/share/phpmyadmin phpmyadmin 配置文件： /usr/share/phpmyadmin/libraries/config.default.php 小技巧 安装完成可以通过命令查看执行文件位置，这样不用担心忘记 which apache2 /usr/sbin/apache2 which php /usr/bin/php which mysql /usr/bin/mysql 重启部分： service php5-fpm restart service nginx restart ``` 不重启 nginx , 令配置生效 ``` nginx -s reload 使用 Nginx + phpmyadmin 时遇到提示 缺少crypt，通过下面方式复制来，并且重启FPM服务即可 使用 cp 命令复制文件： cp /etc/php5/mods-available/mcrypt.ini /etc/php5/fpm/conf.d/ ``` Ubuntu Nginx 配置 #docker-machine gitbash docker-machine下 ``` docker-machine create --driver virtualbox --virtualbox-boot2docker-url=%USERPROFILE%\.docker\machine\cache\boot2docker.iso default docker-machine start default docker-machine stop default ``` 利用docker搭建LAMP(php5+mysql+apache2)集成环境 ``` #在https://hub.docker.com/下搜索 linode/lamp #拉取镜像lamp docker pull linode/lamp #建立docker卷 docker volume create lamp_www # apache的web根目录 docker volume create lamp_apache_conf # apache的配置目录 docker volume create lamp_mysql_conf # MySQL的配置目录 docker volume create lamp_mysql_data # MySQL的数据目录 #宿主主机目录 D:/docker/volumes docker run -it -p 80:80 -p 3306:3306 -v lamp_www:/var/www -v lamp_apache_conf:/etc/apache2 -v lamp_mysql_conf:/etc/mysql -v lamp_mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql --name lamp linode/lamp /bin/bash # 解释： # docker run：运行一个container，如果后面要绑定宿主主机的0-1024端口需要使用sudo # -p port1:port2: 将宿主机的端口port1映射到容器中的port2 # -v volume:path: 将宿主机的docker卷映射到容器中的指定的路径 # -t -i linode/lamp /bin/bash：使用linode/lamp生成容器，并打开shell ```

title: [docker] docker
content: #docker-toolbox git、docker-toolbox 官方boot2docker 百度云盘boot2docker.iso tthd fsmb 1.注意 ``` 如果gitbash安装的位置修改了，则"Docker Quickstart Terminal"属性的目标也要跟着改 正确打开"Docker Quickstart Terminal"后，会自动下载boot2docker.iso，过程比较缓慢 ``` 2.可以浏览器访问github|boot2docker,下载最新版本boot2docker.iso到 ``` %USERPROFILE%\.docker\machine\cache\boot2docker.iso ``` 3.使用非最新版本的boot2docker.iso ``` 断开网络，双击"Docker Quickstart Terminal" ``` #docker-ce 码客|docker镜像 windows 10 安装docker Docker for Windows Installer.exe 菜鸟教程Windows Docker WIN10中DOCKER的安装与使用 error during connect: Get http://%2F%2F.%2Fpipe%2Fdocker_engine/v1.32/info: open //./pipe/docker_eng This error may also indicate that the docker daemon is not running ``` docker-machine env --shell cmd default #或 #docker-machine env default @FOR /f "tokens=*" %i IN ('docker-machine env default') DO @%i docker info docker-machine ls ``` 菜鸟教程|docker容器使用 win10原生有docker 开启Hyper-V ``` 打开控制面板 win+r 输入 control 并回车， 点击 程序 -> 启用或关闭 Windows 功能 ``` 1.docker镜像操作 2.docker镜像操作 ``` docker tag 镜像ID name/tag:版本 #删除所有镜像 docker rmi $(docker images -q) ``` Docker容器 Python 运维 docker决战到底(五)制作自己的Jenkins镜像 Spring Boot 2.0(四)：使用 Docker 部署 Spring Boot 方志朋|史上最简单的SpringCloud教程 | 第十一篇: docker部署spring cloud项目 史上最简单的SpringCloud教程 第十一篇: docker部署spring cloud项目 Spring Cloud Learning | 第十二篇：Docker部署Spring Cloud项目 github|源码 docker中国官方镜像 Dockerfile 使用Dockerfile搭建各种环境 学习Docker之Dockerfile的命令 github|vector4wang docker-compose Docker-Compose入门 使用docker-compose 大杀器来部署服务 上 Docker(四) - Docker-Compose 详解 windows docker-compose.yml windows docker-compose.yml ``` docker-machine env --shell cmd default @FOR /f "tokens=*" %i IN ('docker-machine env default') DO @%i docker info docker-machine ls docker-compose up --build #后台运行 docker-compose up -d #来查看当前运行的应用 docker-compose ps #允许为应用程序运行一次性命令 docker-compose run #查看哪些环境变量可以用于 web 服务 docker-compose run web env #停止服务 docker-compose stop #停止镜像 docker-compose down #down 命令完全移除容器,传递 --volumes 还可以删除 Redis 容器中所使用的数据卷 docker-compose down --volumes ``` docker-compose.yml ``` version: "3" services: redis: image: redis:alpine ports: - "6379" networks: - frontend deploy: replicas: 2 update_config: parallelism: 2 delay: 10s restart_policy: condition: on-failure db: image: postgres:9.4 volumes: - db-data:/var/lib/postgresql/data networks: - backend deploy: placement: constraints: [node.role == manager] vote: image: dockersamples/examplevotingapp_vote:before ports: - 5000:80 networks: - frontend depends_on: - redis deploy: replicas: 2 update_config: parallelism: 2 restart_policy: condition: on-failure result: image: dockersamples/examplevotingapp_result:before ports: - 5001:80 networks: - backend depends_on: - db deploy: replicas: 1 update_config: parallelism: 2 delay: 10s restart_policy: condition: on-failure worker: image: dockersamples/examplevotingapp_worker networks: - frontend - backend deploy: mode: replicated replicas: 1 labels: [APP=VOTING] restart_policy: condition: on-failure delay: 10s max_attempts: 3 window: 120s placement: constraints: [node.role == manager] visualizer: image: dockersamples/visualizer:stable ports: - "8080:8080" stop_grace_period: 1m30s volumes: - "/var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock" deploy: placement: constraints: [node.role == manager] networks: frontend: backend: volumes: db-data: ``` Docker折腾记: (3)Docker Compose构建Gitlab,从配置(https,邮箱验证)到基本可用 docker-compose常用命令 docker-compose部署django+nginx+mysql 项目结构 ``` # tree `-- dokcer-feiyu      |-- docker-compose.yml      |-- nginx      |   |-- Dockerfile      |   `-- nginx.conf      |-- User    |-- Dockerfile    |-- manage.py    |-- requirements.txt    |-- static    |-- users    |-- db.sqlite3    |-- gunicorn.conf    |-- media    |-- start.sh    |-- templates    `-- User ``` Dockerfile ``` FROM nginx #对外暴露端口 EXPOSE 80 8000 #RUN rm /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf ADD nginx.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/ RUN mkdir -p /usr/share/nginx/html/static RUN mkdir -p /usr/share/nginx/html/media ``` nginx.conf ``` server { listen 80; server_name localhost; charset utf-8; error_log /tmp/nginx_error.log; access_log /tmp/nginx_access.log; location /media { alias /usr/share/nginx/html/media; } location /static { alias /usr/share/nginx/html/static; } location / { proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header Host $http_host; proxy_redirect off; proxy_pass http://web:8000; } } ``` Dockerfile ``` FROM python:3.5 #MySQL-Python必须得先安装这个库 RUN mkdir /User #设置工作目录 WORKDIR /User #将当前目录加入到工作目录中 ADD . /User #install any needed pacakges in requirements.txt，你要把所有需要安装的Python模块加到这文 件中。 RUN pip install -r requirements.txt #对外暴露端口 EXPOSE 80 8000 #设置环境变量 ENV SPIDER=/User ``` requirements.txt ``` Django==1.18 Pillow PyMySQL ``` settings.py ``` ALLOWED_HOSTS = ['*', ] DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.mysql', 'NAME': 'dataname', 'USER': 'root',//docker-compose.yml文件中的MYSQL_DATABASE 'PASSWORD': '123456',//docker-compose.yml文件中的MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD 'HOST': 'db',//docker-compose.yml文件中的MYSQL_DATABASE } } ``` start.py ``` #!/bin/bash python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py migrate && gunicorn User.wsgi:application -c gunicorn.conf ``` gunicorn.conf ``` workers=4 bind=['0.0.0.0:8000'] proc_name='blog' pidfile='/tmp/blog.pid' worker_class='gevent' max_requests= ``` docker-compose.yml ``` version: "3" services: db: image: mysql environment: MYSQL_DATABASE: dataname MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: 123456 volumes: - /srv/db:/var/lib/mysql restart: always web: build: ./User ports: - "8001:8001" volumes: - ./User:/User - /tmp/logs:/tmp command: python3 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8001 nginx: build: ./nginx ports: - "81:80" volumes: - ./User/static:/usr/share/nginx/html/static - ./User/media:/usr/share/nginx/html/media links: - web depends_on: - web restart: always ``` 启动和编译 ``` docker-compose build docker-compose up docker-compose up -d ```

title: [php] sublime+php格式化
content:
注： 
1.PHP版本必须是7.0或7.0以上
```
cd "%USERPROFILE%\AppData\Roaming\Sublime Text 3\Packages"
git clone https://github.com/nanch/phpfmt_stable phpfmt
notepad phpfmt.sublime-settings
#保存时，格式化代码
{
 "version": 4,
 "php_bin":"E:/phpStudy/PHPTutorial/php/php-7.0.12-nts/php.exe",
 "format_on_save":true,
 "option": "value"
}
#或
#手动格式化，Ctrl + F11
{
    "format_on_save": false,
    "php_bin": "E:/phpStudy/PHPTutorial/php/php-7.0.12-nts/php.exe",
    "psr1": true,
    "psr1_naming": true,
    "psr2": true,
    "version": 1
}
```

content: 按顺序查看 1.在phpstudy中安装并使用ThinkPHP 5 2.phpstudy上运行ThinkPHP 开发环境 phpstudy phpstorm ``` C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts 127.0.0.1 www.demo.com #访问以下网址，检测是否配置成功 http://www.demo.com/public/ ``` github|thinkphp thinkphp_full.zip ThinkPHP_full_v5.0.24.zip ThinkPHP v5.0.10 官方完整版 ThinkPHP v5.0.10 官方完整版zip包 ThinkPHP v5.0.9 官方完整版zip包 ThinkPHP5 手册 ThinkPHP5.0完全开发手册 Xdebug Helper.crx phpStorm+XDebug+chrome配置 php.ini ``` [XDebug] ;指定Xdebug扩展文件的绝对路径 zend_extension="/path/to/php_xdebug.dll" ;启用代码自动跟踪 xdebug.auto_trace=on ;允许收集传递给函数的参数变量 xdebug.collect_params=on ;允许收集函数调用的返回值 xdebug.collect_return=on ;指定堆栈跟踪文件的存放目录 xdebug.trace_output_dir="/path/to/xdebug" ;是否启用Xdebug的性能分析，并创建性能信息文件 xdebug.profiler_enable=on ;指定性能分析信息文件的输出目录 xdebug.profiler_output_dir="/path/to/xdebug" ;是否开启远程调试 xdebug.remote_enable = on ;指定远程调试的处理协议 xdebug.remote_handler = dbgp ;指定远程调试的主机名 xdebug.remote_host= www.demo.com ;指定远程调试的端口号 xdebug.remote_port = 9000 ;指定传递给DBGp调试器处理程序的IDE Key xdebug.idekey = PHPSTORM ``` wincachegrind ``` #读取cachegrind.out.×××文件的内容，查看效能监测文件的信息 运行后，点击Tools->options，设定你的working folder(php.ini里xdebug.profiler_output_dir的值) ``` 验证 ``` #Settings > Languages & Frameworks > PHP > Debug > Pre-configuration > Validate > Validate按钮 #或 Ctrl + Alt + s > settings 搜索 xdebug > Esc > Pre-configuration > Validate > Validate按钮 ``` 报错 ``` Call to undefined function M() ``` php_xdebug.dll Xdebug导航 官网配置Xdebug 简书|快速上手ThinkPHP 5.0 基于ThinkPHP5实现微信自动登录、微信支付、支付宝支付、Web推送、阿里云短信、极光推送、二维码生成 qrcode ``` https://github.com/SperkJJ/ThinkPHP5/tree/master/TP5-QRcode/controller https://github.com/endroid/QrCode ``` 小风博客|ThinkPHP框架里后台加sql在线备份功能

content: 最详细的Log4J使用教程 ``` log4j.rootLogger=info, stdout, info_log, error_log #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ # 输出到控制台 #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender log4j.appender.stdout.Target=System.out log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.stdout.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss:SSS} %p [%M] %c %L %m%n #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ # info_log #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ log4j.appender.info_log=org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender log4j.appender.info_log.File=logs/info.log log4j.appender.info_log.Append=true log4j.appender.info_log.Threshold=INFO log4j.appender.info_log.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.info_log.DatePattern='.'yyyy-MM-dd log4j.appender.info_log.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss:SSS} %p [%M] %c %L %m%n #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ # error_log #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ log4j.appender.error_log=org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender log4j.appender.error_log.File=logs/error.log log4j.appender.error_log.Append=true log4j.appender.error_log.Threshold=ERROR log4j.appender.error_log.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.error_log.DatePattern='.'yyyy-MM-dd log4j.appender.error_log.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss:SSS} %p [%M] %c %L %m%n ```

title: [java] slf4j
content: 最详细的Log4J使用教程 为方便系统日志管理规范，统一使用slf4j日志 1.概念 ``` SLF4J，即简单日志门面（Simple Logging Facade for Java），不是具体的日志解决方案，它只服务于各种各样的日志系统。 按照官方的说法，SLF4J是一个用于日志系统的简单Facade，允许最终用户在部署其应用时使用其所希望的日志系统 ``` 2.使用步骤(如果是maven项目) ``` org.slf4j slf4j-api 1.7.6 org.slf4j slf4j-log4j12 1.7.6 ``` 3.此目录下建立此文件 /src/main/resources/log4j.properties ``` log4j.rootLogger=INFO,Console,File log4j.appender.Console=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender log4j.appender.Console.Target=System.out log4j.appender.Console.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.Console.layout.ConversionPattern=[%p][%t][%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH\:mm\:ss}][%C] - %m%n log4j.appender.File=org.apache.log4j.RollingFileAppender log4j.appender.File.File=logs/ssm.log log4j.appender.File.MaxFileSize=10MB log4j.appender.File.Threshold=ALL log4j.appender.File.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout log4j.appender.File.layout.ConversionPattern=[%p][%t][%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH\:mm\:ss}][%C] - %m%n #sql log4j.logger.com.mybatis=DEBUG log4j.logger.com.mybatis.common.jdbc.SimpleDataSource=DEBUG log4j.logger.com.mybatis.common.jdbc.ScriptRunner=DEBUG log4j.logger.com.mybatis.sqlmap.engine.impl.SqlMapClientDelegate=DEBUG log4j.logger.java.sql.Connection=DEBUG log4j.logger.java.sql.Statement=DEBUG log4j.logger.java.sql.PreparedStatement=DEBUG ``` 4.类内部使用 ``` import org.slf4j.Logger; import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;   private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AuthzController.class);   logger.info("oauthRequest.getRedirectURI() : " + oauthRequest.getRedirectURI() ``` idea+lombok+@Slf4j lombok插件 ``` org.projectlombok lombok 1.18.0 org.slf4j slf4j-api 1.7.25 ch.qos.logback logback-classic 1.2.3 org.junit.jupiter junit-jupiter-api 5.2.0 test ``` LogTest.java ``` @Slf4j class LogTest { @Test void testLog() { String testInfo = "Free flying flowers are like dreams"; log.info("The test info is :{}", testInfo); } } ``` Java日志框架：slf4j作用及其实现原理 slf4j与log4j、log4j2 Java日志框架：logback详解 logback的使用和logback.xml详解 springboot - logback基础使用篇

title: [maven插件] tomcat
content: maven pom集成tomcat8插件 Maven使用tomcat8-maven-plugin插件 pom.xml ``` 3.1.0 4.3.8.RELEASE 1.8 spring-milestones Spring Milestones https://repo.spring.io/libs-milestone true alfresco-public https://artifacts.alfresco.com/nexus/content/groups/public alfresco-public-snapshots https://artifacts.alfresco.com/nexus/content/groups/public-snapshots true daily org.springframework spring-core ${spring.version} commons-logging commons-logging commons-logging commons-logging 1.2 javax.servlet javax.servlet-api ${javax.servlet.version} provided org.apache.maven.plugins maven-compiler-plugin 3.5.1 1.8 1.8 UTF-8 ${java.home}/lib/rt.jar;${java.home}/lib/jce.jar org.apache.tomcat.maven tomcat8-maven-plugin 3.0-r1655215 tomcat8 8080 package run ``` maven 打包 致命错误：在类路径或引导类路径中找不到软件包 java.lang 参考1 参考2 ``` org.apache.jasper.servlet.TldScanner.scanJars At least one JAR was scanned for TLDs yet contained no TLDs. Enable debug logging for this logger for a complete list of JARs that were scanned but no TLDs were found in them. Skipping unneeded JARs during scanning can improve startup time and JSP compilation time. 编辑文件 apache-tomcat-8.x.x\conf\logging.properties 在最后一行加入 org.apache.jasper.servlet.TldScanner.level = FINE org.apache.el.parser.SKIP_IDENTIFIER_CHECK = true ``` 执行 ``` #把maven中重复的servlet-api删除 mvn dependency:tree            javax.servlet        servlet-api     mvn idea:idea mvn clean install package -Dmaven.test.skip=true -X tomcat8:run-war mvn clean install -Dmaven.test.skip=true -X tomcat8:redeploy ```

title: [C] 环境搭建
content: 1.工具 C语言开发环境配置(win10) sublime text3 + tcc + cmder sublime text3 tcc 非必选|cmder 2.tcc.bat ``` #文件路径: #C:\\Program Files\\tcc\\tcc.bat start cmd /k %2 -run %1 ``` 3.tcc.sublime-build ``` #sublime tex3中菜单Tools -> Bulid System -> New Bulid System..., 另存为tcc.sublime-build { "cmd": ["C:\\Program Files\\tcc\\tcc.bat", "$file", "C:\\Program Files\\tcc\\tcc.exe"], "file_regex": "^(..[^:]*):([0-9]+):?([0-9]+)?:? (.*)$", "selector": "source.c" } ``` 4.tcc编译 ``` #选tcc ctrl+b #或 菜单Tools -> Bulid System -> tcc ``` 5.程序 ``` #编译成hello.obj tcc -Iinclude hello #编译并连接成hello.exe tcc -Iinclude -Llib hello #生成hello.asm tcc -Iinclude -S hello ``` 6.乱码处理 ``` #chcp命令 #UTF-8 chcp 65001 #默认的GBK chcp 936 #美国英语 chcp 437 ``` 7.代码格式化 Sublime插件|C语言代码格式化 sublime实现一键代码格式化 ``` https://packagecontrol.io/packages/SublimeAStyleFormatter https://github.com/timonwong/SublimeAStyleFormatter/releases 按下ctrl + Alt + F是默认格式化整个文件 按下ctrl + K + F即可格式化选中区域 #安装插件 （1）直接下载好想要的插件，然后打开菜单栏里的 Preferences -> Browse Packages，打开包的位置 （2）然后将下载的好插件直接放置到Packages目录，重启Sublime Text3 插件就会安装成功了 （3）安装是否成功可以在 Preferences -> Package Settings 里面查看 ``` 8.graphics.h EasyX|使用graphics.h来绘制图形 graphics.h下载 C语言库安装（mingw选装） mingw-w64 cygwin mingw mingw-get-setup.exe mingw配置 mingw各个Package的作用 MinGW.rar ``` #Path追加 C:\MinGW\bin ``` 选择安装组件 ``` Mark for Installation -> Installation -> Apply Changes -> MinGW Base System -> 右边找到mingw-gcc，选择bin、dev、lic -> Installation -> Mark for removal ``` mingw必选Package ``` #mingw32 mingw32-binutils mingw32-gcc mingw32-mingwrt mingw32-w32api mingw32-mingwrt mingw32-w32api #一般必选 mingw32-libobjc mingw32-libstdc++ #msys msys-bash msys-core msys-coreutils ``` 可选 ``` #如选择了 Fortran 编译器，则必选，Fortran 运行库 mingw32-libgfortran #如选择了 Ada 编译器，则必选，Ada 运行库 mingw32-libgnat #如选择了 Objective-C 编译器，则必选，Objective-C 运行库 mingw32-libobjc #如选择了 C++ 编译器，则必选，C++ 运行库 mingw32-libstdc++ ```

title: [java] 跨域
content: springboot设置cors跨域请求的两种方式 ``` @Configuration public class CorsConfig { @Bean public FilterRegistrationBean corsFilter() { UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource source = new UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource(); CorsConfiguration config = new CorsConfiguration(); config.setAllowCredentials(true); // 设置你要允许的网站域名，如果全允许则设为 * // config.addAllowedOrigin("http://localhost:8080"); config.addAllowedOrigin("*"); // 如果要限制 HEADER 或 METHOD 请自行更改 config.addAllowedHeader("*"); config.addAllowedMethod("*"); source.registerCorsConfiguration("/**", config); FilterRegistrationBean bean = new FilterRegistrationBean(new CorsFilter(source)); // 这个顺序很重要哦，为避免麻烦请设置在最前 bean.setOrder(0); return bean; } } ``` 解决js ajax跨域访问报"No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource."错误 @CrossOrigin ``` @Configuration @EnableWebMvc public class WebConfig extends WebMvcConfigurerAdapter { @Override public void addCorsMappings(CorsRegistry registry) { registry.addMapping("/api/**") .allowedOrigins("http://domain2.com") .allowedMethods("PUT", "DELETE") .allowedHeaders("header1", "header2", "header3") .exposedHeaders("header1", "header2") .allowCredentials(false).maxAge(3600); } } ``` springboot filter跨域 ``` import org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.ServletComponentScan; import org.springframework.stereotype.Component; import javax.servlet.*; import javax.servlet.annotation.WebFilter; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest; import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse; import java.io.IOException; @Component @ServletComponentScan @WebFilter(urlPatterns = "/*",filterName = "corsFilter") @Order(1) public class CorsFilter implements Filter { @Override public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException { } @Override public void doFilter(ServletRequest servletRequest, ServletResponse servletResponse, FilterChain filterChain) throws IOException, ServletException { HttpServletResponse response = (HttpServletResponse) servletResponse; HttpServletRequest request = (HttpServletRequest)servletRequest; String origin = request.getHeader("Origin"); response.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Origin", origin); response.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Methods", "POST, GET, OPTIONS, DELETE"); response.setHeader("Access-Control-Max-Age", "3600"); response.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Headers", "x-requested-with,Authorization"); response.setHeader("Access-Control-Allow-Credentials", "true"); String method = request.getMethod(); if(method.equalsIgnoreCase("OPTIONS")){ servletResponse.getOutputStream().write("Success".getBytes("utf-8")); }else{ filterChain.doFilter(servletRequest, servletResponse); } } @Override public void destroy() { } } ``` bean注册|不注册会报错 ``` @Bean public FilterRegistrationBean filterRegistrationBean() { FilterRegistrationBean registrationBean = new FilterRegistrationBean(); CorsFilter corsFilter = new CorsFilter(); registrationBean.setFilter(corsFilter); List urlPatterns = new ArrayList(); urlPatterns.add("/*"); registrationBean.setUrlPatterns(urlPatterns); return registrationBean; } ``` ``` mvn package -Dmaven.test.skip=true spring-boot:repackage ``` No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource.'Ajax跨域访问解决方案 jsonp ``` $.ajax({ type:"GET", url:"http://www.deardull.com:9090/getMySeat", //访问的链接 dataType:"jsonp", //数据格式设置为jsonp jsonp:"callback", //Jquery生成验证参数的名称 success:function(data){ //成功的回调函数 alert(data); }, error: function (e) { alert("error"); } }); 后端 @ResponseBody @RequestMapping("/getMySeat") public String getMySeatSuccess(@RequestParam("callback") String callback){ Gson gson=new Gson(); Map map=new HashMap<>(); map.put("seat","1_2_06_12"); logger.info(callback); return callback+"("+gson.toJson(map)+")"; } ``` spring-boot 允许接口跨域并实现拦截（CORS） ``` @Configuration public class CorsConfig extends WebMvcConfigurerAdapter { @Override public void addCorsMappings(CorsRegistry registry) { registry.addMapping("/**") .allowedOrigins("*") .allowCredentials(true) .allowedMethods("GET", "POST", "DELETE", "PUT") .maxAge(3600); } private CorsConfiguration buildConfig() { CorsConfiguration corsConfiguration = new CorsConfiguration(); List list = new ArrayList<>(); list.add("*"); corsConfiguration.setAllowedOrigins(list); /* // 请求常用的三种配置，*代表允许所有，当时你也可以自定义属性（比如header只能带什么，只能是post方式等等） */ corsConfiguration.addAllowedOrigin("*"); corsConfiguration.addAllowedHeader("*"); corsConfiguration.addAllowedMethod("*"); return corsConfiguration; } @Bean public CorsFilter corsFilter() { UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource source = new UrlBasedCorsConfigurationSource(); source.registerCorsConfiguration("/**", buildConfig()); return new CorsFilter(source); } } ```

title: [layui] layui技巧
content: layui table表格框溢出时不会自动关闭解决方法 ``` ``` layui 令模态框的选项溢出框体时，选项可见 ``` ``` layui 令模态框的选项溢出框体时，横向固定，竖直方向可滚动 ``` .layui-layer-page .layui-layer-content,#showLayui{ overflow-x: hidden; overflow-y: scroll; } ``` layui select动态拼接option ``` $("#selectedId").empty(); $("#selectedId").append(''); $.ajax({ url: url, dataType: 'json', type: 'post', async: false, data: {}, complete: function (XHR, TS) { var returnObj = eval('(' + XHR.responseText + ')'); $.each(returnObj, function (i, obj) { $("#selectedId").append(''); }); } }); ``` layui select手动选中 ``` var data = { id:1, value:"123" }; $("#targetId").val(data.value); $("#targetId").siblings("div.layui-form-select").find('dl dd[lay-value=' + data.id + ']').click(); ``` 只读+灰色 ``` var data = { id:1, value:"123" }; $("#targetId").val(data.value); $("#targetId").attr("readonly","true"); $("#targetId").css("color","gray"); ``` layui省市区联动 layui input框校验 ``` ``` jq监听属性变化 ``` $("#divId").bind("input propertychange",function(){ var str = $("#divId").val(); }); ``` layui模态框形成和销毁 ``` var showContent = $("#modelContentId"); layer.open({ content: '测试回调', success: function(layero, index){ console.log(layero, index); } yes: function(index, layero){ //如果设定了yes回调，需进行手工关闭 layer.close(index); }, end: function(){ $('#modelContentId').html(showContent); } }); ```

[springboot] 百度文字识别
content: springboot中使用百度ocr实现文字识别功能 百度AI开放平台文字之身份证识别的实现 github|APILearn/baiduaidemo ``` 下载百度提供的工具类,这几个工具类都会用到，都需要下载 FileUtil https://ai.baidu.com/file/658A35ABAB2D404FBF903F64D47C1F72 Base64Util https://ai.baidu.com/file/C8D81F3301E24D2892968F09AE1AD6E2 HttpUtil https://ai.baidu.com/file/544D677F5D4E4F17B4122FBD60DB82B3 GsonUtils https://ai.baidu.com/file/470B3ACCA3FE43788B5A963BF0B625F3 获取AccessTokenUtil import java.io.BufferedReader; import java.io.FileNotFoundException; import java.io.IOException; import java.io.InputStreamReader; import java.net.SocketTimeoutException; import java.net.URL; import java.net.URLConnection; import java.util.HashMap; import java.util.Map; import net.sf.json.JSONArray; import net.sf.json.JSONObject; import org.springframework.stereotype.Component; /** * @Author: bian * @Date: 2018/7/16 15:47 * @Todo: 百度API要求每个月换一次Token,因此专门写一个工具类用来更新token. */ public class AccessTokenUtil { public static Map getToken(String clientId,String clientSecret){ Map token = new HashMap(); String str = "https://aip.baidubce.com/oauth/2.0/token?grant_type=client_credentials&client_id="+clientId+"&client_secret="+clientSecret; try { URL url = new URL(str); URLConnection connectionData = url.openConnection(); connectionData.setConnectTimeout(2000); BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader( connectionData.getInputStream(), "UTF-8")); StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(); String line = null; while ((line = br.readLine()) != null){ sb.append(line); } String datas = sb.toString(); JSONObject jsonData = JSONObject.fromObject(datas); token.put("access_token", jsonData.getString("access_token").toString()); token.put("session_key", jsonData.getString("session_key").toString()); token.put("scope", jsonData.getString("scope").toString()); token.put("refresh_token", jsonData.getString("refresh_token").toString()); token.put("session_secret", jsonData.getString("session_secret").toString()); token.put("expires_in", jsonData.getString("expires_in").toString()); }catch (SocketTimeoutException e) { System.out.println("连接超时"); } catch (FileNotFoundException e) { System.out.println("加载文件出错"); }catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("IOException"); } return token; } } ```

content: JS & JQuery 动态添加 select option ``` jQuery获取Select选择的Text和Value: 1. //为Select添加事件，当选择其中一项时触发 $("#select_id").change(function(){//code...}); 2. //获取Select选择的Text var checkText=$("#select_id").find("option:selected").text(); 3. //获取Select选择的Value var checkValue=$("#select_id").val(); 4. //获取Select选择的索引值 var checkIndex=$("#select_id ").get(0).selectedIndex; 5. //获取Select最大的索引值 var maxIndex=$("#select_id option:last").attr("index"); jQuery添加/删除Select的Option项： 1. //为Select追加一个Option(下拉项) $("#select_id").append(""); 2. //为Select插入一个Option(第一个位置) $("#select_id").prepend(""); 3. //删除Select中索引值最大Option(最后一个) $("#select_id option:last").remove(); 4. //删除Select中索引值为0的Option(第一个) $("#select_id option[index='0']").remove(); 5. //删除Select中Value='3'的Option $("#select_id option[value='3']").remove(); 内容清空： $("#charCity").empty(); ```

title: [python] 数据科学
content: 查看setuptools支持版本 ``` https://pypi.org/project/setuptools/ 2.7|3.4|3.5|3.6|3.7 ``` 选择Python 3.6.3版本 python-3.6.3-amd64.exe ``` #访问 https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-363/ #因为zip版没有Scripts目录，所以不推荐 #https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.6.3/python-3.6.3-embed-amd64.zip ``` 新建环境变量 ``` PYTHON %USERPROFILE%/AppData/Local/Programs/Python/Python36 Path追加 %PYTHON%;%PYTHON%/Scripts; ``` pip升级 ``` python -m pip install --upgrade pip ``` python数学库 ``` NumPy的访问地址： https://pypi.python.org/pypi/numpy Matplotlib的访问地址： https://pypi.python.org/pypi/matplotlib ``` numpy、matplotlib、scipy的下载和安装|【注意】查找关键字cp36和amd64 ``` ----------------- 安装numpy start ----------------- 访问 https://pypi.org/project/numpy/#files 下载 numpy-1.15.4-cp36-none-win_amd64.whl https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/51/70/7096a735b27359dbc0c380b23b9c9bd05fea62233f95849c43a6b02c5f40/numpy-1.15.4-cp36-none-win_amd64.whl 使用python安装numpy pip3.6 install numpy-1.15.4-cp36-none-win_amd64.whl ----------------- 安装numpy end ----------------- ----------------- 安装matplotlib start ----------------- 访问 https://pypi.org/project/matplotlib/#files 点击 https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/b1/56/569c83515c10146fd0aa09e086816b12e301d0811048e3354a6e9b77ba9a/matplotlib-3.0.2-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl 使用python安装matplotlib pip3.6 install matplotlib-3.0.2-cp36-cp36m-win_amd64.whl ----------------- 安装matplotlib end ----------------- ----------------- 安装scipy start ----------------- 访问 https://pypi.org/project/scipy/#files 点击 https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/62/e2/364f0bcc641aeff79d743c732769d5dc31a1e78c27699229431412c4b425/scipy-1.1.0-cp36-none-win_amd64.whl 使用python安装scipy pip3.6 install scipy-1.1.0-cp36-none-win_amd64.whl ----------------- 安装scipy end ----------------- ``` python数据干货 ``` python用最小二乘法分析数据趋势以及做数据预测 数据预测 https://blog.csdn.net/zwq912318834/article/details/78476842 python数据分析入门学习笔记 https://www.cnblogs.com/zzhzhao/p/5269217.html 入门Python数据分析最好的实战项目（一） https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000015440560 《利用Python进行数据分析·第2版》第1章 准备工作 https://www.jianshu.com/p/04d180d90a3f 预测数值型数据：回归 https://blog.csdn.net/u010665216/article/details/77680227 ``` 数据科学的完整学习路径（Python版） 深度学习相关的模型训练、评估和预测相关代码 Python数据科学开发环境

title: [springboot] springboot+rabbitmq+websocket
content:
参考 springboot+rabbitmq+websocket广播模式进行消息实时推送 rabbitmq ## 注意 producer和consumer只要放在同一个工程即可 mvn创建rabbitmq ``` mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=com.code -DartifactId=rabbitmq -DarchetypeArtifactId=maven-archetype-webapp -DarchetypeCatalog=internal ``` ## 修改pom.xml ``` war org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-parent 1.4.0.RELEASE org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-web org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-amqp org.springframework.boot spring-boot-starter-websocket src/main/java **/*.properties **/*.xml false src/main/resources **/*.properties **/*.xml false org.apache.maven.plugins maven-compiler-plugin 8 8 ``` JSONObject.toJSON ``` com.alibaba fastjson 1.1.31 ``` @Slf4j注解 ``` <-- org.slf4j slf4j-api 1.7.5 org.slf4j slf4j-log4j12 1.7.5 log4j log4j 1.2.17 --> org.projectlombok lombok 1.16.18 provided ``` idea插件 lombok ``` http://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/6317-lombok-plugin ``` application.properties ``` #rabbitmq配置 spring.rabbitmq.host=127.0.0.1 spring.rabbitmq.port=5672 spring.rabbitmq.username=guest spring.rabbitmq.password=guest #开启消息发送确认 spring.rabbitmq.publisher-confirms=true spring.rabbitmq.publisher-returns=true #返回无法插入队列的消息 spring.rabbitmq.template.mandatory=true ``` 新建package ``` 新建目录 src/main/java -> 右键 Mark Directory as -> Sources Root -> java目录右键 New -> Package -> com.code.rabbitmq com.code.rabbitmq.config com.code.rabbitmq.constant com.code.rabbitmq.model com.code.rabbitmq.web com.code.rabbitmq.web.websocket ``` com.code.rabbitmq.Application | 入口 ``` package com.code.rabbitmq; import org.springframework.boot.SpringApplication; import org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.SpringBootApplication; @SpringBootApplication public class Application { public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception { SpringApplication.run(Application.class, args); } } ``` com.code.rabbitmq.model.MessageVo ``` package com.code.rabbitmq.model; public class MessageVo { private String content; private String routingKey; private String receiveUserId; public void setContent(String content) { this.content = content; } public String getContent() { return this.content; } public void setRoutingKey(String routingKey) { this.routingKey = routingKey; } public String getRoutingKey() { return this.routingKey; } public String getReceiveUserId() { return receiveUserId; } public void setReceiveUserId(String receiveUserId) { this.receiveUserId = receiveUserId; } } ``` com.code.rabbitmq.constant.RabbitConstant ``` package com.code.rabbitmq.constant; //准备消息队列与路由key public class RabbitConstant { //交换机名称 public final static String EXCHANGE = "exchange_test"; //队列 public final static String QUEUE_TRANSACTION = "queue_transaction"; public final static String QUEUE_CONTRACT = "queue_contract"; public final static String QUEUE_QUALIFICATION = "queue_qualification"; //路由key public final static String RK_TRANSACTION = "transaction"; public final static String RK_CONTRACT = "contract"; public final static String RK_QUALIFICATION = "qualification"; } ``` com.code.rabbitmq.config.RabbitMqConfig ``` package com.code.rabbitmq.config; import com.code.rabbitmq.constant.RabbitConstant; import org.springframework.amqp.core.Binding; import org.springframework.amqp.core.BindingBuilder; import org.springframework.amqp.core.DirectExchange; import org.springframework.amqp.core.Queue; import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean; import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration; @Configuration public class RabbitMqConfig { /** * 声明队列 * * @return */ @Bean public Queue queueTransaction() { // true表示持久化该队列 return new Queue(RabbitConstant.QUEUE_TRANSACTION, true); } @Bean public Queue queueContract() { // true表示持久化该队列 return new Queue(RabbitConstant.QUEUE_CONTRACT, true); } @Bean public Queue queueQualification() { // true表示持久化该队列 return new Queue(RabbitConstant.QUEUE_QUALIFICATION, true); } /** * 声明交互器 * * @return */ @Bean DirectExchange directExchange() { return new DirectExchange(RabbitConstant.EXCHANGE); } /** * 绑定 * * @return */ @Bean public Binding bindingTransaction() { return BindingBuilder.bind(queueTransaction()).to(directExchange()).with(RabbitConstant.RK_TRANSACTION); } /** * 绑定 * * @return */ @Bean public Binding bindingContract() { return BindingBuilder.bind(queueContract()).to(directExchange()).with(RabbitConstant.RK_CONTRACT); } /** * 绑定 * * @return */ @Bean public Binding bindingQualification() { return BindingBuilder.bind(queueQualification()).to(directExchange()).with(RabbitConstant.RK_QUALIFICATION); } } ``` com.code.rabbitmq.web.Sender | 发布者实现接口 ``` package com.code.rabbitmq.web; import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject; import com.code.rabbitmq.constant.RabbitConstant; import com.code.rabbitmq.model.MessageVo; import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j; import org.springframework.amqp.core.Message; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.core.RabbitTemplate; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.support.CorrelationData; import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired; import org.springframework.stereotype.Component; import javax.annotation.PostConstruct; import java.util.UUID; @Component @Slf4j public class Sender implements RabbitTemplate.ConfirmCallback, RabbitTemplate.ReturnCallback { @Autowired private RabbitTemplate rabbitTemplate; @PostConstruct public void init() { rabbitTemplate.setConfirmCallback(this); rabbitTemplate.setReturnCallback(this); } //消息发送确认回调方法 @Override public void confirm(CorrelationData correlationData, boolean ack, String cause) { log.info("消息发送成功:" + correlationData); } //消息发送失败回调方法 public void returnedMessage(Message message, int replyCode, String replyText, String exchange, String routingKey) { log.error("消息发送失败:" + new String(message.getBody())); } /** * 发送消息，不需要实现任何接口，供外部调用 * * @param messageVo */ //只要调用send方法就可一把消息发送到指定的队列中了，发送后会调用confirm或者returnedMessage方法来返回结果 public void send(MessageVo messageVo) { CorrelationData correlationId = new CorrelationData(UUID.randomUUID().toString()); rabbitTemplate.convertAndSend(RabbitConstant.EXCHANGE, messageVo.getRoutingKey(), JSONObject.toJSON(messageVo).toString(), correlationId); } } ``` com.code.rabbitmq.web.websocket.WebSocketServerEndpoint | socket服务 ``` package com.code.rabbitmq.web.websocket; import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject; import com.code.rabbitmq.model.MessageVo; import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j; import org.springframework.stereotype.Component; import javax.websocket.*; import javax.websocket.server.PathParam; import javax.websocket.server.ServerEndpoint; import java.io.IOException; import java.util.Map; import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap; import java.util.function.BiConsumer; /** * ServerEndpoint *

* 使用springboot的唯一区别是要@Component声明下，而使用独立容器是由容器自己管理websocket的，但在springboot中连容器都是spring管理的。 *

* 虽然@Component默认是单例模式的，但springboot还是会为每个websocket连接初始化一个bean，所以可以用一个静态set保存起来。 */ @ServerEndpoint("/ws/code/{userId}") //WebSocket客户端建立连接的地址 @Component @Slf4j public class WebSocketServerEndpoint { /** * 存活的session集合（使用线程安全的map保存） */ private static Map livingSessions = new ConcurrentHashMap(); /** * 建立连接的回调方法 * * @param session 与客户端的WebSocket连接会话 * @param userId 用户名，WebSocket支持路径参数 */ @OnOpen public void onOpen(Session session, @PathParam("userId") String userId) { livingSessions.put(session.getId(), session); log.info(userId + "进入连接"); } @OnMessage public void onMessage(String message, Session session, @PathParam("userId") String userId) { log.info(userId + " : " + message); sendMessageToAll(userId + " : " + message); } @OnError public void onError(Session session, Throwable error) { log.info("发生错误"); log.error(error.getStackTrace() + ""); } @OnClose public void onClose(Session session, @PathParam("userId") String userId) { livingSessions.remove(session.getId()); log.info(userId + " 关闭连接"); } /** * 单独发送消息 * * @param session * @param message */ public void sendMessage(Session session, String message) { try { session.getBasicRemote().sendText(message); } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } /** * 群发消息 * * @param message */ public void sendMessageToAll(String message) { MessageVo messageVo = JSONObject.parseObject(message, MessageVo.class); livingSessions.forEach(new BiConsumer() { @Override public void accept(String sessionId, Session session) { //发给指定的接收用户 if (sessionId.equals(messageVo.getReceiveUserId())) { sendMessage(session, message); } } }); } } ``` com.code.rabbitmq.config.ConsumerConfig | 消费者配置 ``` package com.code.rabbitmq.config; import com.code.rabbitmq.web.websocket.WebSocketServerEndpoint; import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel; import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j; import org.springframework.amqp.core.AcknowledgeMode; import org.springframework.amqp.core.Message; import org.springframework.amqp.core.Queue; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.annotation.EnableRabbit; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.annotation.RabbitListenerConfigurer; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.connection.ConnectionFactory; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.core.ChannelAwareMessageListener; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.listener.RabbitListenerEndpointRegistrar; import org.springframework.amqp.rabbit.listener.SimpleMessageListenerContainer; import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired; import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Qualifier; import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean; import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration; import org.springframework.messaging.converter.MappingJackson2MessageConverter; import org.springframework.messaging.handler.annotation.support.DefaultMessageHandlerMethodFactory; import java.io.IOException; @Configuration @EnableRabbit @Slf4j public class ConsumerConfig implements RabbitListenerConfigurer { @Autowired private ConnectionFactory connectionFactory; @Autowired private WebSocketServerEndpoint webSocketServerEndpoint; @Bean public DefaultMessageHandlerMethodFactory handlerMethodFactory() { DefaultMessageHandlerMethodFactory factory = new DefaultMessageHandlerMethodFactory(); factory.setMessageConverter(new MappingJackson2MessageConverter()); return factory; } @Bean public SimpleMessageListenerContainer messageContainer(@Qualifier("queueTransaction") Queue transaction, @Qualifier("queueContract") Queue contract, @Qualifier("queueQualification") Queue qualification) { SimpleMessageListenerContainer container = new SimpleMessageListenerContainer(connectionFactory); container.setQueues(transaction, contract, qualification); container.setMaxConcurrentConsumers(1); container.setConcurrentConsumers(1); container.setAcknowledgeMode(AcknowledgeMode.MANUAL); //设置确认模式手工确认 container.setMessageListener(new ChannelAwareMessageListener() { @Override public void onMessage(Message message, Channel channel) throws Exception { byte[] body = message.getBody(); log.info("receive msg : " + new String(body)); try { webSocketServerEndpoint.sendMessageToAll(new String(body)); channel.basicAck(message.getMessageProperties().getDeliveryTag(), false);//确认消息成功消费 } catch (IOException e) { log.error("消息推送前台出错：" + e.getMessage() + "/r/n重新发送"); channel.basicNack(message.getMessageProperties().getDeliveryTag(), false, true); //重新发送 } } }); return container; } @Override public void configureRabbitListeners(RabbitListenerEndpointRegistrar rabbitListenerEndpointRegistrar) { rabbitListenerEndpointRegistrar.setMessageHandlerMethodFactory(handlerMethodFactory()); } } ``` websocket 配置 ``` package com.code.rabbitmq.config; import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean; import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration; import org.springframework.web.socket.server.standard.ServerEndpointExporter; @Configuration public class WebSocketConfig { @Bean public ServerEndpointExporter serverEndpointExporter() { return new ServerEndpointExporter(); } } ``` index.html ```js WebSocket

Lua安装配置 参考|Cocos2d Lua开发环境完全搭建 环境与工具 cocos2d-x源文件 cocos2d-x-3.10.zip ant vs2013 vs2013 lua插件 babelua ``` ========= 设置环境变量 start ========= #设置环境变量 COCOS_X_ROOT E:\Cocos\Cocos\Cocos2d-x\Cocos2d-x-3.10 COCOS_TEMPLATES_ROOT E:\Cocos\Cocos\Cocos2d-x\Cocos2d-x-3.10\templates COCOS_CONSOLE_ROOT E:\Cocos\Cocos\Cocos2d-x\Cocos2d-x-3.10\tools\cocos2d-console\bin ANDROID_HOME E:\Android\android-sdk ANDROID_SDK_ROOT E:\Android\android-sdk ANT_ROOT E:\Android\ant NDK_ROOT E:\Android\ndk ========= 设置环境变量 end ========= ========= vs2013 lua插件 start ========= https://blog.csdn.net/fjdmy001/article/details/52882779 lua scripts folder：脚本目录 lua exe path：运行的exe文件路径 Working path：工作目录 Command line：没用过，也用不到 Lua project name：lua项目名称 lua scripts folder：<项目父目录路径>\demo\src lua exe path：<项目父目录路径>\demo\simulator\win32\demo.exe Working path：<项目父目录路径>\demo\src Lua project name：demo ========= vs2013 lua插件 end ========= ========= vs2013编译启动项目 start com.demo.app -l cpp -d G:\workspaces\cocos2dx\ #打开 frameworks\runtime-src\proj.win32\<项目名>.sln #打开解决方案，并开始编译 https://blog.csdn.net/yuan2053/article/category/6774853 ========= vs2013编译启动项目 end title: [webpack] webpack搭建前端项目
content:
webpack搭建前端项目 ``` npm install webpack --save -dev #-g #不建议使用全局 #相关的依赖包 #babel的包 npm install babel babel-loader babel-core babel-preset-es2015 babel-preset-stage-0 --save-dev npm install babel-preset-react --save-dev #react的包 npm install react react-dom --save-dev #在项目根目录新建一个webpack.config.js #webpack.config.js const webpack = require('webpack'); const path = require('path'); module.exports = { mode: 'development', // 这个配置是项目的入口文件的配置 entry: { myBuild: './src/index.js' }, output: { // 这个是指定项目打包后的输出目录,__dirname就是webpack.config.js所在的目录,这里就是打包时打包到项目根目录下的build文件夹下(如没有webpack会自己创建) path: path.resolve(__dirname, './build'), // 这个是关系到我们项目发布后，一些资源的访问路径问题，后面会讲到，而且这个也跟我们开发时候的热部署有关，让他指向我们的打包后的路径就行。 publicPath:"build/", // 这是打包后的js文件名字,这个[name]就是我们在上面的entry中指定的Key.也就是myBuild filename: '[name].js' }, // 这是跟服务相关的配置，具体可以去看官网 devServer: { port:9090 //端口你可以自定义 }, module: { rules: [ { test: /\.js$/, exclude: /(node_modules|bower_components)/, use: { loader: 'babel-loader', options: { presets: ["es2015","react",'stage-0'] } } }, { test: /\.css$/, use: [ 'style-loader', 'css-loader' ] }, { test: /\.(png|jpg|gif)$/, use: [ { loader: 'file-loader', options: { name: '[name]_[hash].[ext]', outputPath: './img', publicPath: 'build/img/' } } ] }, {test: /\.json$/, loader: 'json-loader'}, {test: /\.(woff|woff2|svg|eot|ttf)$/, loader: 'url-loader?limit=50000&name=fonts/[name].[hash].[ext]'} ] } } #在根目录下新建一个index.html #index.html react
#id为app的入口 , build目录为:publicPath #新建一个index.js,这个文件就是我们webpack.config.js中的entry中的文件,若配置时有目录则我们建好相应的目录,我这里的index.js是在src下,所以我们建立一个src的文件夹 此时的目录结构是这样的,在src下有index.js #在index中写入以下代码进行测试 setTimeout(() => { alert("author: sunh")}, 1000); npm install webpack-cli –-save-dev #打包命令 webpack ```

title: [maven] nexus私有仓库搭建
content: nexus官网 nexus-2.14.1-01-bundle.zip nexus-3.13.0-01-win64.zip ``` ######## nexus-3.13 start ######## #启动时间较长,请耐心等待 nexus.exe /run #nexus.exe /install nexus3 #nexus.exe /start #nexus.exe /stop #nexus.exe /status #nexus.exe /restart ######## nexus-3.13 end ######## 访问 127.0.0.1:8081/ 默认账号: admin 密码: admin123 ``` maven仓库 ``` https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ https://repo2.maven.org/maven2/ http://maven.yonyoucloud.com/nexus/content/repositories/public/ http://maven.aliyun.com/nexus/content/groups/public ``` 使用nexus创建maven私有仓库 Nexus3.6 window版私服搭建安装、配置教程 maven私库nexus3安装及使用 ``` #访问的仓库类型： hosted 宿主仓库：主要用于部署无法从公共仓库获取的构件以及自己或第三方的项目构件; proxy 代理仓库：代理公共的远程仓库; group 仓库组：Nexus 通过仓库组统一管理多个仓库,这样我们在项目中直接请求仓库组即可请求到仓库组管理的多个仓库. 简单的说,可以上传私有的项目到hosted,以及配置proxy以获取第三方的依赖（比如可以配置中央仓库的地址）.前面两个都弄好了之后,在通过group聚合给客户提供统一的访问地址. Nexus预定义了2个本地仓库, maven-releases:可以存放自己项目中发布的构建, 通常是Release版本的. maven-snapshots:可以发布那些非release版本, 非稳定版本. ``` ``` mvn package clean mvn deploy -e ``` Failed to transfer file 与 Return code is 处理 pom.xml ``` 4.0.0 {{项目名}} {{包名}} {{打包方式}} 1.0-SNAPSHOT {{项目名}} org.apache.maven.plugins maven-compiler-plugin 1.7 1.7 org.apache.maven.plugins maven-surefire-plugin true compile nexus Releases http://localhost:8081/repository/maven-public/ nexus Snapshots http://localhost:8081/repository/maven-snapshots/ ``` settings.xml ``` {{本地maven仓库地址}} org.sonatype.plugins nexus admin admin123 nexus * http://localhost:8081/repository/maven-public/ repo2 central http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/ nexus nexus http://127.0.0.1:8081/repository/maven-public/ true true central http://repo2.maven.org/maven2/ true true nexus ```

title: [js] js实现map
content: js实现map JS中的Map基本操作 JS中的Map基本操作 小程序HashMap.js ``` var app = getApp(); /** js实现hashmap数据结构 */ class HashMap { constructor() { /** 存放键的数组(遍历用到) */ this.keys = new Array(); /** 存放数据 */ this.data = new Object(); } /** * 放入一个键值对 * @param {String} key * @param {Object} value */ put(key, value) { if (this.data[key] == null) { this.keys.push(key); } this.data[key] = value; } /** * 获取某键对应的值 * @param {String} key * @return {Object} value */ get(key) { return this.data[key]; } /** * 删除一个键值对 * @param {String} key */ remove(key) { this.keys.remove(key); this.data[key] = null; // delete this.data[key]; } /** * 遍历Map,执行处理函数 * @param {Function} 回调函数 function(key,value,index){..} */ each(fn) { if (typeof fn != 'function') { return; } var len = this.keys.length; for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) { var k = this.keys[i]; fn(k, this.data[k], i); } } /** * 获取键值数组(类似Java的entrySet()) * @return 键值对象{key,value}的数组 */ entrys() { var len = this.keys.length; var entrys = new Array(len); for (var i = 0; i < len; i++) { entrys[i] = { key: this.keys[i], value: this.data[i] }; } return entrys; } /** * 判断Map是否为空 */ isEmpty() { return this.keys.length == 0; } /** * 获取键值对数量 */ size() { return this.keys.length; } /** * 重写toString */ toString() { var s = "{"; for (var i = 0; i < this.keys.length; i++, s += ',') { var k = this.keys[i]; s += k + "=" + this.data[k]; } s += "}"; return s; } } export default HashMap; ```

title: [ngrok] ngrok搭建
content: 一分钟实现内网穿透（ngrok服务器搭建） 10分钟教你搭建自己的ngrok服务器 frp 小米球 ngrok中文 Sunny-Ngrok ``` #https://github.com/inconshreveable/ngrok mkdir ngrok apt-get update apt-get install git golang git clone https://github.com/inconshreveable/ngrok.git ngrok 域名添加A记录 将*.ngrok与ngrok指向服务器公网ip #设置环境变量，Go语言的安装位置 export GOPATH=/usr/local/ngrok/ export NGROK_DOMAIN="ngrok.<域名>" #为域名生成证书 openssl genrsa -out rootCA.key 2048 openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -key rootCA.key -subj "/CN=$NGROK_DOMAIN" -days 5000 -out rootCA.pem openssl genrsa -out server.key 2048 openssl req -new -key server.key -subj "/CN=$NGROK_DOMAIN" -out server.csr openssl x509 -req -in server.csr -CA rootCA.pem -CAkey rootCA.key -CAcreateserial -out server.crt -days 5000 #拷贝证书到指定位置 cp rootCA.pem assets/client/tls/ngrokroot.crt cp server.crt assets/server/tls/snakeoil.crt cp server.key assets/server/tls/snakeoil.key ######### 编译 start ######### #86位 #win服务端 GOOS=windows GOARCH=386 make release-server #win客户端 GOOS=windows GOARCH=386 make release-client #linux服务端 GOOS=linux GOARCH=386 make release-server #linux客户端 GOOS=linux GOARCH=386 make release-client #64位 #win服务端 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 make release-server #win客户端 GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 make release-client #linux服务端 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 make release-server #linux客户端 GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 make release-client ######### 编译 end ######### ls bin #编辑服务端启动脚本 vim start_ngrokd.sh #!/bin/bash ./bin/ngrokd -tlsKey="snakeoil.key" -tlsCrt="snakeoil.crt" -domain="ngrok.<域名>" -httpAddr=":801" -httpsAddr=":802" #-tunnelAddr=":4443" #一键部署ngrok服务器（CentOS、Debian、Ubuntu） https://github.com/clangcn/ngrok-one-key-install #编辑ngrok配置文件 notepad ngrok.cfg server_addr: "ngrok.<域名>:4443" trust_host_root_certs: false # ngrok.exe -subdomain <二级域名> -config=ngrok.cfg <客户端端口> ``` 免费frp内网穿透服务 Ngrok配置和使用

title: [linux] Linux禁止IP、解封IP的方法
content:
```
#屏蔽单个IP的命令是
iptables -I INPUT -s 123.45.6.7 -j DROP
#封IP段即从123.45.6.1到123.45.6.254的命令是
iptables -I INPUT -s 123.45.6.0/24 -j DROP
#封IP段即从123.45.0.1到123.45.255.254的命令
iptables -I INPUT -s 124.45.0.0/16 -j DROP
#封整个段即从123.0.0.1到123.255.255.254的命令
iptables -I INPUT -s 123.0.0.0/8 -j DROP
#指令I是insert指令
iptables-save
```

title: [hexo] github + hexo
content: hexo中文官网 hexo 解决用Hexo和GitHub搭建博客时hexo d命令报错问题 ``` git config --global user.name "用户名" git config --global user.email "邮箱地址" ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "邮箱地址" cd ~/.ssh ssh -T git@github.com #hexo配置 npm install hexo-deployer-git --save vim _config.yml # deploy: type: git #这里的repo需要设置成git仓库的ssh链接,github用户名注意区分大小写 repo: git@github.com:/.github.io.git branch: master #网站部署 hexo clean #清除缓存文件db.json和已生成的静态文件public hexo g #生成网站静态文件到默认设置的public文件夹 hexo d #部署网站到设定的仓库 ``` Hexo博客添加SEO-评论系统-阅读统计-站长统计 百度站长统计 hexo+github,搭建属于自己的博客 hexo主题 [Cover](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/daisygao/hexo-themes-cover)- A chic theme with facebook-like cover photo [Oishi](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/henryhuang/oishi)- A white theme based on Landscape plus and Writing. [Sidebar](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/hardywu/hexo-theme-sidebar)- Another theme based on Light with a simple sidebar [TKL](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/SuperKieran/TKL)- A responsive design theme for Hexo. 一个设计优雅的响应式主题 [Tinnypp](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/levonlin/Tinnypp)- A clean, simple theme based on Tinny [Writing](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/yunlzheng/hexo-themes-writing)- A small and simple hexo theme based on Light [Yilia](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/litten/hexo-theme-yilia)- Responsive and simple style 优雅简洁响应式主题，我用得就是这个 [Pacman voidy](https://link.jianshu.com?t=https://github.com/Voidly/pacman)- A theme with dynamic tagcloud and dynamic snow

title: [github]windows github ssh-key
content: git bash ``` git config --global user.name "用户名" git config --global user.email "邮箱地址" ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "邮箱地址" cd ~/.ssh ssh -T git@github.com echo "# hexo" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git remote add origin https://github.com//hexo.git git push -u origin master ```

title: [react-native] react-native expo create-react-native-app
content: React Native高效开发 React Native之expo expo在线运行 nodejs xde expo-cli ``` #因为版本号是2.0.1+，到后期运行react-native项目会报错 #npm install -g react-native-cli #卸载已经安装的react-native-cli npm uninstall -g react-native-cli npm install react-native@0.55.4 npm install -g react-native-cli@1.2.0 ``` React Native 开发之IDE ``` #react-native npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org --global npm config set disturl https://npm.taobao.org/dist --global npm install -g yarn react-native-cli yarn config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org --global yarn config set disturl https://npm.taobao.org/dist --global react-native init AwesomeProject cd AwesomeProject react-native run-android #expo npm install expo-cli --global expo init demo cd demo expo start #create-react-native-app,版本:node >= 6.0、npm >= 4.0、react-native-cli、git npm i -g create-react-native-app #dos终端下执行 create-react-native-app demo cd demo npm start ```

content: sublime text3 插件 Package Control ``` import urllib.request,os; pf = 'PackageControl.sublime-package'; ipp = sublime.installed_packages_path();urllib.request.install_opener( urllib.request.build_opener(urllib.request.ProxyHandler()) ); open(os.path.join(ipp, pf),'wb').write(urllib.request.urlopen( 'http://sublime.wbond.net/' + pf.replace('','%20')).read()) ```

title: centos7+jdk8+maven3.5+tomcat8.5+solo
content:
#jdk8
```
rpm -qa | grep jdk
#yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk.x86_64
yum remove java-1.8.0-openjdk

wget http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u181-b13/96a7b8442fe848ef90c96a2fad6ed6d1/jdk-8u181-linux-x64.tar.gz?AuthParam=1537775743_4940afcb8606087f72fcfb730c09aae1

mv jdk-8* jdk8.tar.gz
tar zxvf jdk8.tar.gz
mv jdk-8u181 /usr/lib/jvm/jdk8
```

#下载maven
```
http://maven.apache.org/download.cgi

wget http://mirrors.shu.edu.cn/apache/maven/maven-3/3.5.4/binaries/apache-maven-3.5.4-bin.tar.gz
tar zxvf apache-maven-3.5.4-bin.tar.gz
mv apache-maven-3.5.4 /usr/local/maven
chmod -R 755 /usr/local/maven
```

#tomcat
```
wget http://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/apache/tomcat/tomcat-8/v8.5.34/bin/apache-tomcat-8.5.34.tar.gz
tar zxvf apache-tomcat-8.5.34.tar.gz 
mv apache-tomcat-8.5.34 /usr/local/tomcat8
chmod -R 755 /usr/local/tomcat8
```
#环境变量
```
vim /etc/profile
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/jdk8
export JRE_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/jdk8/jre
export CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/lib/dt.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$JRE_HOME/bin:$PATH

CATALINA_HOME=/usr/local/tomcat8
PATH=$CATALINA_HOME/bin:$PATH
export PATH CATALINA_HOME

export MAVEN_HOME=/usr/local/maven
export PATH=$MAVEN_HOME/bin:$PATH
#:wq
source /etc/profile
```

#solo+solo皮肤部署
```
git clone https://github.com/b3log/solo.git
cd solo/src/main/webapp/
git clone https://github.com/b3log/solo-skins.git skins
cd ..
mvn install -Dmaven.test.skip=true
cp target/solo.war /usr/local/tomcat8/webapps/
cd /usr/local/tomcat8/webapps/solo/WEB-INF/classes
vim latke.properties
serverHost=域名
serverPort=80

vim /usr/local/tomcat8/conf/server.xml
#8080改为80
```
#启动tomcat
```
startup.sh
```
